conclusion: Identify given information: p_A, V_A, T_A, p_B, V_B, p_C, V_C.
Convert temperature at state A from Celsius to Kelvin.
State the ideal gas law: pV = nRT.
Determine relationship between states A and B as isochoric.
Calculate T_B using isochoric process relation.
Determine relationship between states B and C as isobaric.
Calculate T_C using isobaric process relation.
Convert temperature at state C from Kelvin to Celsius.
